direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a string representation of a compass direction, but 'word' returns the full name while 'azimuth' returns the azimuth value.
Both methods return a string representation of a compass direction, but 'abbreviation' returns the abbreviated form while 'azimuth' returns the azimuth value.
Both methods involve resolving a key to a string value, with similar control flows and exception handling.
The 'azimuth' method depends on the 'compassPoint' method to determine the point of direction.
